name: Dining Room
longDesc:
You are in the DINING ROOM.
There is a doorway to the DOWNSTAIRS HALLWAY and an exit to the YARD.
There is a large window which looks out onto the street.
One wall is open to the LIVING ROOM.
description:
You are in the DINING ROOM.
There is a doorway to the DOWNSTAIRS HALLWAY and an exit to the YARD.
One wall is open to the LIVING ROOM.

dining room table.name: dining room table
dining room table.description: The dining room table is tall, mahogany, and set for a formal dinner party for no discernable reason.
dining room table.discoveryStatement: There are three CANDLES in a candelabra and wax everywhere.

painting.name: painting
painting.description: Wall-sized painting of a bowl of fruit. There is a clue hidden in the painting. Clue tbd

knife.name: knife
knife.description: The knife is sharp, pointy, and could come in handy.
